title: ollama/ollama
summary: Get up and running with Llama 3.2, Mistral, Gemma 2, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, allowing easy integration of local LLMs into Python apps.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, supporting Node and browser environments.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama, enabling use of local Ollama models in LangChain workflows.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama with chat interfaces, model management, and RAG support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java client library for Ollama, providing simple APIs to interact with local LLMs.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Simple RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) implementation using Ollama and ChromaDB.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-like inline suggestions.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat interface for Ollama with conversation memory and model switching.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU and persistent storage support.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix package and module for Ollama enabling reproducible deployments on NixOS.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that lets users chat with local Ollama models inside Discord.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced interactive CLI for Ollama with syntax highlighting and conversation history.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module for CI/CD pipelines that need to spin up Ollama containers for testing.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Unofficial Rust crate providing async wrappers around the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library for Ollama with simple chat and embeddings interfaces.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot integration for Ollama allowing teams to query local LLMs from Slack channels.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration for Ollama, enabling local models in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-llamaindex
summary: LlamaIndex LLM and embeddings integration for Ollama to power local RAG systems.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Clean React-based chat UI for Ollama with dark mode and conversation export.
